concept.title: Welcome to the Fulton County Library
concept.shortdesc: Library cards are free and available to all Georgia Residents. Those living in Fulton County are eligible for a Fulton County Library card, specifically.

conbody.p: This guide will help you decide if a Fulton County Library card is best for you, and walk you through the process of acquiring and maintaining your library card.
